BDA.window

Class App_Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • BDA.window.App_Window

  • public class App_Window
extends java.lang.Object
    Main application window class This class is used to initialize and manage the graphical user's main interface
    Version:
    Release
    Author:
    Francisco

        public static void saveFile(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method saves the DOM structure of the XML file in memory to the database.
        Parameters:
        doc - this interface represents the entire XML document. Conceptually, it is the root of the document tree, and provides the primary access to the document's data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - failed to save XML file
